short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 解决谷歌等页面无法在iframe中引用的问题

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The X-Frame-Options HTTP response header can be used to indicate whether or not a browser should be allowed to render a page in a <frame> or <iframe>. Using this plugin to remove it!
